amendment.description: Page 62, after line 2, insert the following new section: SEC. 609. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the Fossil Energy Research and Development program of the Department of Energy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the Fossil Energy Research and Development program of the Department of Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 68 - 353 (Roll no. 589).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 68 - 353 (Roll no. 589).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Flake.
